title.narrative: OUTPUT 3.2.1 POLICY GUIDELINE FOR HI ECD

description.narrative: Output 3.2.1 By the end of 2015, policy, guidelines and coordination Mechanism are improved to implement quality holistic- integrative early childhood development program (National, Aceh, Java, NTB, NTT and Sulawesi).

mailing-address.narrative: 10th Floor Wisma Metropolitan 2 Jl. Jenderal Sudirman Jakarta 12920

sector.narrative: Breastfeeding protection, promotion and support (including work on Code)
System strengthening - early learning / pre-primary standards and governance
System strengthening - inclusive education for children with disabilities
Water supply - safety/quality/treatment (including household treatment and safe storage)

description.narrative: Water supply and Sanitation policy, planning and administration

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Output 3.2.1 By the end of 2015, policy, guidelines and coordination Mechanism are improved to implement quality holistic- integrative early childhood development program (National, Aceh, Java, NTB, NTT and Sulawesi).
Number of district governments in Sulawesi with a plan and allocated funds for HI-ECD

actual.value: 2015:Mamuju district, West Sulawesi: Bupati Mamuju's decree on HI-ECD endorsed in 2012 is followed up with development of local law (PERDA) to be endorsed in early 2015. - Polman district, West Sulawesi: Bupati's decrees on District Task Force on Taman Siwalipari Management and on Establisment of Sub-dis

title.narrative: Number of targeted district governments in Java province which include integrated quality ECD strategy in their development plan and budget

actual.value: 2015:Pro poor quality HI-ECD strategy in the form of Bupati's decree (Perbub) issued in Situbondo and Brebes districts.

title.narrative: ECD Budgeting Guideline is available is developed and approved by Bappenas

actual.value: 2015:The budgeting guidelines has been incorporated into the general guidelines updated by KEMKOPMKE and will be used in annex of the upcoming PERMENKOPMK

title.narrative: Number of districts in NTT with coordination mechanism for planning, implementation and monitoring of HIECD

actual.value: 2015:ne district (Sikka) fully functional and additional one district(Allor) starting.

title.narrative: A presidential decree and related regulations promoting ECD at national and subnational levels promulgated

baseline.value: 1 Regulation on HI-ECD issued by Coordinating Ministry of People's Welfare

actual.value: 2015:Coordinating Ministry For Human Resources and Culture stated HI-ECD in its Strategic Plan

title.narrative: Percentage increase in the number of villages with early childhood education centers established

baseline.value: Aceh Besar: 38, Aceh Jaya: 47, Aceh Timur: 50

title.narrative: A Resource Center for Quality HI-ECD is established
